annotations.description: This Mother's Day give your mom what she really wants at brunch: Alcohol. Today I present the brunch staple: the Pimm's Cup! ********************************...
annotations.title: Pimm's Cup | How to Drink

textContent:
• 1 Cucumber Ribbon
• 1 Apple Ribbon
• 3 slices lemon
• 3 Strawberry Slices
• Pack in glass with Ice
• 2 oz. -or- 60 ml. Pimm's #1
• 4 oz. -or- 120 ml. Lemon Soda
• Garnish as you see fit

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tD5GVqYhQRY
title: Pimm's Cup
